Photosynthesis is the process by which green plants, algae, and some bacteria make their own food.
It takes place in the chloroplasts of plant cells, which contain the green pigment chlorophyll.
During photosynthesis, plants use sunlight as the energy source, together with carbon dioxide (CO‚ÇÇ) from the air and water (H‚ÇÇO) from the soil.
These are converted into glucose (a type of sugar, C‚ÇÜH‚ÇÅ‚ÇÇO‚ÇÜ), which is stored and used by the plant for energy and growth.
Oxygen (O‚ÇÇ) is released as a by-product into the atmosphere.
üëâ Word equation:Carbon dioxide + Water ‚Üí (Sunlight & Chlorophyll) ‚Üí Glucose + Oxygen

/privacy-policy.title: CeyQuest
/privacy-policy.description: CeyQuest is Sri Lanka‚Äôs first AI-powered education platform offering real-time Q&A, gamified quizzes, trilingual support, and syllabus-aligned learning for O/L students. Learn smarter with AI, track your progress, and master every subject with ease.
p: At CeyQuest, your privacy is our top priority. We are committed to protecting the data and personal information of our users. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you interact with CeyQuest.
We collect different types of information to provide and improve our services:
Personal Information:When you sign up or interact with CeyQuest, we may collect personal details like your name, email address, and other contact information.
Usage Data:We gather data on how you use CeyQuest, including search history, question logs, preferences, and interactions with learning tools.
Device Information:We collect data about the device you use to access CeyQuest, such as your IP address, browser type, device model, and operating system.
We use your information to enhance your learning experience and improve our services:
Service Delivery: Your data helps us provide personalized content, relevant suggestions, and features tailored to your educational needs.
Improvement and Development: We analyze usage data to improve CeyQuest‚Äôs features, content accuracy, and functionality.
Customer Support: If you contact us for support, we may use your information to help resolve your questions or concerns.
Security: We use information to maintain the safety and security of CeyQuest, including detecting suspicious activities or abuse.
We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. However, we may share data under the following circumstances:
Service Providers: We may share your data with trusted third-party vendors who help us operate CeyQuest (e.g., hosting, analytics, or customer support).
Legal Requirements: We may disclose information if required by law or in response to lawful requests.
Business Transfers: In case of a merger, acquisition, or asset sale, your data may be transferred as part of the business assets.
We implement reasonable technical and organizational measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, disclosure, or alteration. However, no online service can guarantee complete security.
You have certain rights regarding your personal data, including:
Access: Request access to the personal data we hold about you.
Correction: Ask for corrections if your information is inaccurate or incomplete.
Deletion: Request deletion of your personal data, subject to any legal requirements.
Opt-Out: You can choose to limit certain types of data usage, such as personalized recommendations.
CeyQuest may contain links to external websites or services. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these third parties.

CeyQuest is primarily designed for students with parental or school guidance. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under the age of 13 without appropriate consent. If we discover such information has been collected, we will take steps to delete it.

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any updates will be reflected on this page with a new effective date. We encourage you to review it periodically to stay informed about how we protect your information.
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or how CeyQuest handles your data, please contact us at:
By using CeyQuest, you agree to the terms outlined in this Privacy Policy.

p: CeyQuest is Sri Lanka‚Äôs first AI-powered education platform designed to empower students through smart, syllabus-aligned learning. Whether you're a Grade 6 student or preparing for the O/L exam, CeyQuest brings you a personalized and tech-driven way to study. Built with modern learners in mind, it combines advanced AI, subject-specific resources, and gamified progress tracking to make education more effective and engaging.

From real-time Q&A with CeynovX AI to interactive quizzes, video lessons, and a personalized dashboard ‚Äî CeyQuest gives students everything they need to stay motivated, focused, and ahead. Whether you're aiming for top ranks, supporting your class as a teacher, or helping your child as a parent, CeyQuest is more than a platform ‚Äî it's the future of learning in your hands.
